issue.title: [Format] Mark C Stream Interface as stable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16789](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16789). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in [this dev mailing list thread](https://lists.apache.org/thread/0y604o9s3wkyty328wv8d21ol7s40q55), we may wish to mark the C stream interface stable. All feedback is the thread was positive, so I will go ahead and make a PR and call a vote.

Voting thread: https://lists.apache.org/thread/5bvk6m3y3wl0m4jdsnyhdylt1w5j288k
